data.text:
Rankin/Bass Productions was an American animation studio, founded by Arthur Rankin Jr. and Jules Bass. It produced many animated specials, until 1987, with most of the studio's productions being outsourced to Japan. Several of these animations were released on VHS in the UK, by Channel 5 Video, but most releases had excluded the Rankin/Bass ident at the end.

Releases[]
